name: George BERKA, petitioner, v. CITY OF MIDDLETOWN, CONNECTICUT.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
George BERKA, petitioner,
v.
CITY OF MIDDLETOWN, CONNECTICUT.
attorneys: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until May 6, 2019, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
casebody.head_matter:
George BERKA, petitioner,
v.
CITY OF MIDDLETOWN, CONNECTICUT.
No. 18-7806.
Supreme Court of the United States
April 15, 2019.
Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied. Petitioner allowed until May 6, 2019, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.
